prTitle: feat: add filter bar HTML and CSS for mugs catalog
prBody:
## Summary

- Replaced the React app entry `index.html` with the Starbucks mugs collector catalog HTML structure (header, filter bar, grid, modal)
- Added `#filter-bar` section between header and main with all specified controls:
  - `#search` — text search input with `aria-label`
  - `#filter-series` — series dropdown with "All Series" default option
  - `#year-min` / `#year-max` — year-range number inputs inside a labeled group
  - `#filter-reset` — reset button
- Added `#results-count` paragraph with `aria-live="polite"` and `aria-atomic="true"` for accessible live region updates
- Added comprehensive CSS for the filter bar:
  - Flexbox layout that wraps gracefully on smaller viewports
  - Inputs and selects styled with Starbucks brand colors (`#1e3932`, `#00704a`)
  - Reset button with hover and `focus-visible` states
  - Focus rings on all interactive controls (WCAG 2.1 AA)
  - Empty-state `.grid-empty` styles
  - Results count styles with max-width alignment
  - Responsive breakpoints: mobile (≤600px) stacks controls vertically; small (≤400px) forces single-column grid

Closes #24
